fields.label: Expertise
fields.name: expertise
fields.description: Areas of expertise (e.g., Azure Security, Threat Hunting)

fields.label: Icon
fields.name: icon
fields.description: Icon name from lucide-react (e.g., shield, cloud, terminal)

fields.label: Color
fields.name: color
fields.description: Hex color code for this topic

fields.label: Name
fields.name: name
fields.description: Skill name (e.g., Log Analysis, Incident Response)

fields.label: Content
fields.name: body
fields.description: Lesson content (supports markdown, code blocks, images)

fields.label: Has Lab
fields.name: hasLab
fields.description: Does this lesson have an associated lab?

fields.label: Lab Type
fields.name: labType
fields.description: Guided lab with instructions or CTF challenge

fields.label: Allow Time Extension
fields.name: allowsExtension
fields.description: Allow users to extend time limit

fields.label: Extension Duration (Minutes)
fields.name: extensionMinutes
fields.description: Additional time when extension is used

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: What the user needs to find

fields.label: Flag Value
fields.name: flagValue
fields.description: The correct flag value or regex pattern

fields.label: Hint Penalty
fields.name: hintPenalty
fields.description: Points deducted when hint is revealed

fields.label: Is Regex
fields.name: isRegex
fields.description: Treat flag value as regex pattern

fields.label: Related Lesson
fields.name: lesson
fields.description: Optional: If this lab is tied to a specific lesson

fields.label: Track Type
fields.name: trackType
fields.description: Job Track (SOC Analyst path) or Skill Track

fields.label: Estimated Hours
fields.name: estimatedHours
fields.description: Estimated hours to complete the track

fields.label: Color
fields.name: color
fields.description: Hex color code for this track

fields.label: Duration (Hours)
fields.name: durationHours
fields.description: Estimated hours to complete entire track

fields.label: Steps
fields.name: steps
fields.description: Ordered list of modules and labs in this track

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: Brief description of what this step covers

fields.label: Step Type
fields.name: stepType
fields.description: Type of content in this step

fields.label: Required
fields.name: isRequired
fields.description: Is this step required for track completion?

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
